NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Distribution and column Import & Export is the flow between 2034 and 2782? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Fertilization to node Grinding and from node Soil Preparation to node Grinding, which path has a larger flow?
